languages.text: "Медикарий Мариус Клементий Сорн Кеблау, ты убедил меня в истинности своей веры. Сим даю тебе благословение Вольного Торговца и приказываю нести миссионерскую службу".
"Medicae Officer Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, you have convinced me of your genuine faith. I hereby give you my blessing as Rogue Trader and order you to take up missionary service."
languages.original_text: "Медикарий Мариус Клементий Сорн Кеблау, ты убедил меня в истинности своей веры. Сим даю тебе благословение Вольного Торговца и приказываю нести миссионерскую службу".

traits.locale_text: "Medicae Officer Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, you have convinced me of your genuine faith. I hereby give you my Rogue Trader's blessing and order you to take up service as a missionary."
"Medicae Officer Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, you have convinced me of your genuine faith. I hereby give you my Rogue Trader's blessing and order you to take up service as a missionary."
"Medicae Officer Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, you have convinced me of your genuine faith. I hereby give you my blessing as Rogue Trader and order you to take up missionary service."
"Medicae Officer Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, you have convinced me of your genuine faith. I hereby give you my blessing as Rogue Trader and order you to take up missionary service."
"Medicae Officer Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, you have convinced me of your genuine faith. I hereby give you my blessing as Rogue Trader and order you to take up missionary service."
"Medicae Officer Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, you have convinced me of your genuine faith. I hereby give you my blessing as Rogue Trader and order you to take up missionary service."

languages.text: « Officier de medicae Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, vous m'avez {mf|convaincu|convaincue} de la sincérité de votre foi. Je vous accorde donc ma bénédiction de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} et vous ordonne de poursuivre votre service de missionnaire. »
languages.original_text: "Medicae Officer Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, you have convinced me of your genuine faith. I hereby give you my blessing as Rogue Trader and order you to take up missionary service."

traits.locale_text: « Officier de medicae Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, vous m'avez {mf|convaincu|convaincue} de la sincérité de votre foi. Je vous accorde donc ma bénédiction de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} et vous ordonne de poursuivre votre service de missionnaire. »

languages.text: «Oficial de medicae Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, me ha convencido de que su fe es genuina. Le concedo oficialmente mi bendición como Comerciante Independiente y le ordeno que preste servicio como misionero».
languages.original_text: "Medicae Officer Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, you have convinced me of your genuine faith. I hereby give you my blessing as Rogue Trader and order you to take up missionary service."

traits.locale_text: «Oficial de medicae Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, me ha convencido de que su fe es genuina. Le concedo oficialmente mi bendición como Comerciante Independiente y le ordeno que preste servicio como misionero».

languages.text: “马吕斯·克列门斯·索恩·凯布劳医务官，你真诚的信念打动了我。我在此以行商浪人的身份赐予你我的祝福，命令你即刻起成为一名传教士。”
languages.original_text: "Medicae Officer Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, you have convinced me of your genuine faith. I hereby give you my blessing as Rogue Trader and order you to take up missionary service."

traits.locale_text: “马吕斯·克列门斯·索恩·凯布劳医务官，你真诚的信念打动了我。我在此以行商浪人的身份赐予你我的祝福，命令你即刻起成为一名传教士。”

languages.text: 「メディケア士官マリウス・クレマンス・サム・ケブロー、あなたは真の信仰を証明した。お前にローグトレーダーの祝福を与え、聖務団として奉仕するよう命じる」
languages.original_text: "Medicae Officer Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, you have convinced me of your genuine faith. I hereby give you my blessing as Rogue Trader and order you to take up missionary service."

traits.locale_text: 「メディケア士官マリウス・クレマンス・サム・ケブロー、あなたは真の信仰を証明した。お前にローグトレーダーの祝福を与え、聖務団として奉仕するよう命じる」

languages.text: "Medicae-Offizier Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, Ihr habt mich von der Echtheit Eures Glaubens überzeugt. Ich gebe Euch hiermit als {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} meinen Segen und den Befehl, Euren Dienst als Missionar zu beginnen."
languages.original_text: "Medicae Officer Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, you have convinced me of your genuine faith. I hereby give you my blessing as Rogue Trader and order you to take up missionary service."

traits.locale_text: "Medicae-Offizier Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, Ihr habt mich von der Echtheit Eures Glaubens überzeugt. Ich gebe Euch hiermit als {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} meinen Segen und den Befehl, Euren Dienst als Missionar zu beginnen."

languages.text: "Sıhhiye Subayı Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, beni inancının hakiki olduğu konusunda ikna ettin. Seni Hür Tacir olarak kutsuyorum ve misyonerlik görevini üstlenmeni emrediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Medicae Officer Marius Clemence Sorne Keblau, you have convinced me of your genuine faith. I hereby give you my blessing as Rogue Trader and order you to take up missionary service."
